## gonedrive upload

Upload a stdin to onedrive by into the given file

### Synopsis

Upload a stdin to onedrive by into the given file

```
gonedrive upload [remote-filepath] [content as string] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -e, --encrypt   encrypt the content before uploading
  -h, --help      help for upload
```
